channel.title: Recipes on flynn's site
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on flynn's site

item.title: Buns
item.description: Ingredients (per 4 buns) 220g all-purpose flour 20g sugar 14g butter, room temperature (1 tbsp.) 1 egg 5g salt 4g yeast sesame or poppy seeds Procedure Knead dough until smooth: 200g flour, 4g salt, 20g sugar, 14g butter, 1 egg yolk, 100+g water Rise until nearly doubled (~2 hours). Divide and proof (~1 hour). Brush with egg wash: 1 egg white, 50g water Sprinkle on seeds.
